title: Tower of Barad-dur (3R104)
text:
Set:	Realms of the Elf-lords
Kind:	Shadow
Culture:	Sauron
Twilight:	1
Card Type:	Condition
Game Text:	To play, exert a [Sauron] minion. Plays to your support area. Each time the fellowship moves, the Free Peoples player must discard a card from hand.
Lore:	“The Dark Tower had been rebuilt, it was said. From there the power was spreading….”
Rarity:	R
